title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define project scope, gather requirements from stakeholders, and create a detailed project plan.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components for travel recommendation, carbon footprint calculation, offsetting mechanisms, and data management. Consider scalability, modularity, and integration with third-party services.

title: Database Design
description: Design the database schema to store travel options, user preferences, carbon footprint data, offsetting transactions, and other relevant data. Consider the relationships between entities, data normalization, indexing, and scalability requirements. Ensure data integrity and security.

title: User Interface Design
description: Design the user interface for the travel recommendation system, including input forms, search results, carbon footprint information, and eco-friendly travel options display.

title: Travel Recommendation Algorithm
description: Develop the algorithm for recommending eco-friendly travel options based on user preferences and environmental impact.

title: Carbon Footprint Calculation
description: Implement the logic for calculating the carbon footprint of travel options based on various factors (e.g., mode of transportation, distance, etc.).

title: Carbon Offsetting Integration
description: Integrate with third-party carbon offsetting services or develop in-house mechanisms for offsetting carbon footprints. The integration should support multiple offsetting providers and allow for easy addition or removal of providers. Develop a flexible and extensible architecture to accommodate future changes in offsetting mechanisms or providers.

title: Backend Development
description: Implement the backend components, including APIs, data processing, and integration with external services.

title: Frontend Development
description: Implement the user interface components, integrating with the backend APIs and ensuring a smooth user experience.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop and execute test plans for functional, performance, and security testing of the application.

title: Security Audit
description: Conduct a comprehensive security audit to identify and mitigate potential vulnerabilities in the application.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the deployment infrastructure, continuous integration/deployment pipelines, and monitoring systems for the application.

title: Documentation and User Guides
description: Create comprehensive documentation, including user guides, API documentation, and technical documentation for the application.
